question: Some events on Earth happen instantly while others take thousands of years to occur. Which process takes the longest time to complete?
candidate_answers: (A) rivers rising due to storms and floods (B) evaporation of water from the leaves of a plant (C) weathering of a rock to form small rocks and sand (D) movement of small pieces of rock by flowing water
answer: weathering of a rock to form small rocks and sand
label: C
